page.title: 18Women's Institute Illston
page.content: The Women's Institute holds meetings in Illston Village Hall every second Thursday of the month. The membership is at present 42 ladies. These range greatly in age and also in interests, but all share a common interest in friendship and homelife. Meetings usually take the form of Institute business, put to the floor by the President of the Institute, followed by a guest speaker. Speakers talk to members on all types of subjects, including travel, cookery, needlework, antiques, almost anything which might be of interest. Refreshments follow the speaker and people have time to socialize.
